ygData.subject: [EQ-Monks] Monkey Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: ok I m a 18 (almost 19) monk, recently got Feign Death and Instil Doubt both really cool skills I m sure you ll all agree. The main things are they take ages
ygData.messageBody:
ok I'm a 18 (almost 19) monk, recently got Feign Death and Instil Doubt both
really cool skills I'm sure you'll all agree.

The main things are they take ages to train up, are there any hints or tips
you lot can give me about it, so far I'm feigning then instil doubt whilst
feigned and as soon as feign pops FD again then ID, rinse and repeat. Is
this the best way of doing it or are there better ways ?

also up until now i haven't really bothered using weapon at all (mucked
about with it and both 1hb and 2hb are at about 10) are there any cheap
weapons that i can pick up with low weight or are they all expensive things
like fighting batons and knuckle dusters ?

any help appreciated

Kilk
18th Monk
Innorouk server
